Wiretapping and Other Eavesdropping Devices and Methods

abstract.p: Justice Department plans to make final decision on Sept 25 on which university will conduct technical review of Carnivore surveillance system; Carnivore program, used by FBI, can intercept and search private e-mail for words and phrases, allowing agents to quickly sift through many messages for evidence of possible criminal activity (S)

block.p: The Justice Department plans to make a final decision on Sept. 25 on which university will conduct a technical review of the Carnivore surveillance system, a department spokeswoman said yesterday. The department posted the standards and specific expectations for the academic review on its Web site (www.usdoj.gov) in late August. The Carnivore program, used by the F.B.I., can intercept and search private e-mail for words and phrases, allowing agents to quickly sift through many messages for evidence of possible criminal activity.
